text.div:
BP Observation Status Codes Interpretation

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
C Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final statusadded v2.5
D Deletes the BPX recordadded v2.5
F Final status; Can only be changed with a corrected statusadded v2.5
O Order detail description only (no status)added v2.5
P Preliminary statusadded v2.5
W Post original as wrong, e.g. transmitted for wrong patientadded v2.5

name: v2 BP Observation Status Codes Interpretation
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0511 ( BP Observation Status Codes Interpretation)

concept.display: Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final status
Final status; Can only be changed with a corrected status
Post original as wrong, e.g. transmitted for wrong patient
